hasDitaContent.@value: Both pasireotide and amifampridine prolong the QT interval. Most manufacturers advise avoiding the use of two or more drugs that are associated with QT prolongation. hasDitaContent.@value: Both pasireotide and ticagrelor can increase the risk of bradycardia.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  pasireotide  and  ticagrelor  can increase the risk of bradycardia.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  pasireotide  and  tizanidine  can increase the risk of bradycardia.

hasDitaContent.@value: Both pasireotide and tizanidine prolong the QT interval. Most manufacturers advise avoiding the use of two or more drugs that are associated with QT prolongation. Increasing age, female sex, cardiac disease, and some metabolic disturbances (notably hypokalaemia) predispose to QT prolongation.
